DOC.brief_title: Study In People With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: A Multicenter , Randomized , Double-Blind , Double-Dummy , Parallel-Group , Placebo-Controlled , Study To Evaluate Efficacy , Safety And Tolerability Of Oral GW677954 Capsules ( 2.5 , 5 , 10 , 15 And 20 Mg Once A Day ) As A Monotherapy ( Diet and/or exercise treat ) Or As An Add-On To Metformin For 16 Weeks Duration In Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
